DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness Astym Treatment For de Quervain 's Tenosynovitis
DOC.criteria: . Positive Finkelstein 's test : The client report pain first compartment extensor retinaculum thumb tuck hand deviate ulnarly . ii . Persistent symptoms > 3 wks resolve additional 3 week splint iii . A diagnosis physician `` de Quervain 's '' , `` fist compartment tenosynovitis '' , `` radial styloid tenosynovitis '' iv . Patients must agree comply predetermine splint regimen . History cortical steroid injection affect wrist and/or thumb ii . History previous wrist trauma affect limb iii . Comorbidity carpal tunnel syndrome ( CTS ) , radial tunnel syndrome , osteoarthritis , rheumatoid arthritis , autoimmune disease inflammatory condition , lateral epicondylitis tendinopathies iv .
